alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jackson; Jones; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 22 at 10:46AM CST until February 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of two tenths to six tenths of an inch. Highest ice amounts along the Highway 20 corridor. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Buchanan, Delaware and Dubuque Counties. In Illinois, Jo Daviess and Stephenson Counties. * WHEN...Now through noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice and strong winds. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the commutes this evening and Thursday morning.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque; Jackson; Jones; Linn
